attributes.action: to reverse his decision to order the Red Arrows to perform in France on 25th July
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Swanage is gearing up for the holiday season with many people deciding to come to Swanage for their Holidays to enjoy the Red Arrows Display. We have just heard that they have been told not to perform. At this late stage it is downright bad manners and will create hugh disappointment and resentment to those involved in making the decision.
